title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Karpovychi of Chernihiv regio...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Karpovychi of Chernihiv region, Bilopillya, Kindrativka, Zapsillya of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Krasne, Neskuchne of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Seredyna-Buda and Vorozhba of Sumy region, Zemlyanky, Potykhonove, Bolohivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
